title: Epic 1.1: Development Environment Setup & Demo Understanding
description: Establish a stable foundation for the AIFordable Groceries POC by setting up the OpenAI demo environment and understanding the existing architecture.

subtasks.title: Clone the official openai-realtime-agents-demo repository from GitHub
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Repository successfully cloned to local development machine

subtasks.title: Install all npm dependencies for both backend and frontend
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: npm install completes without errors in both directories

subtasks.title: Create and configure .env file with OPENAI_API_KEY
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Application successfully authenticates with OpenAI API

subtasks.title: Launch application and verify end-to-end functionality
subtasks.acceptance_criteria: Backend starts, frontend accessible, test conversation completes successfully
